name: Word Connect HD
summary:
Do you like puzzles and word games? Brought to you by Greyhead Studio, a fun and addictive word connect game from space! 
With over 450 000 words and 500 levels, enjoy a fun space theme Word Connect game and become the ultimate word guru! 
Your goal is to create words using the letters provided. Rearrange letter tiles by clicking on the letters in order to spell a word and click the ”check word” button. If the word you found is valid, it’ll fill the empty letter slots in the big box above. If the word isn’t valid, click the “shuffle” button to clear the letters and reshuffle them around and try again. You can also type the word out on your keyboard. If you find yourself stuck on a word, don’t get discouraged! Click the “ puzzle” button to get a hint and find out which letter to use next. 
Have fun learning new words and training your logic with your friends and family.
